newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Avant! started at buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Avant! started at buy.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said it has started coverage of Avant! Corp with a buy rating based on its belief Avant! is "well positioned to sustain strong sales and earnings growth."
-- In a statement, Hambrecht & Quist said Avant! has design tools that are critical to the semiconductor industry as it focuses on chips using deep submicron geometries.
-- Hambrecht & Quist said the company has grown through excellent customer acceptance of its internally developed tools as well as acquired design tools.
-- The investment firm added that Avant!'s strong fundamentals are tempered somewhat by litigation risk.
